Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45338 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-23
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45338 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-23. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-23, affected by CVE-2024-45338
